Pick: Soraka {{champion:16}} (She's been my main for a long time, and I just find her super fun to play)
Ban: Leona {{champion:89}} (As a support main, nothing tilts me more than seeing a Leona at bot lane. It sucks since I find that I like playing champions that are weak to her...)
Instalock: **SONA**SONA**SONA**SONA**SONA** {{champion:37}} (This champ is the best ever. I have level 7 mastery with her, and I've mained her for as long as I can remember, and I have her DJ skin. SONA FTW!!)

Dishonorable Mentions: BAN: {{champion:157}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:55}}
